question: What effect would a light crosswind of approximately 7 knots have on vortex behavior?

A calm or light wind near the surface and a relatively strong wind just above the
inversion.

The temperature differential between the cold and warm layers must be at least 10
degrees C.

A wind direction difference of at least 30 degrees C between the wind near the
surface and the wind just above the inversion.

you descend to the flight level corresponding to the indicated cabin altitude or the
